home.line: laruche is a full-service web agency based in Geneva.
home.subtitle: In a constantly changing world, you need to focus on what’s important to you. That’s why at laruche we are specializing in improving your workflows so you can be more efficient at doing what you love.

head.title: Services | laruche
head.description: At laruche we are providing a whole range of services such as consulting, project management, training and development.

services.line: What we can do for you.
services.title: Services
services.subtitle: At laruche we are providing a whole range of services such as consulting, project management, training and development.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: Regardless of the question, we are here to answer it. From legacy systems to next tendencies like blockchain, we can provide you priceless insights so you can make informed decisions.

services.title: Cloud Solutions
services.description: You have a current solution and you need an audit, you want to reduce your running costs. We can help you to tailor your infrastructure in order to improve your process.

services.title: Development
services.description: Our web development expertise area range from static website to fully featured web/mobile application. We use state-of-the-art technologies and we have a team ready for any projects. We can also provide you in-house developers to complete your team.

services.title: Training
services.description: We can provide specialized training for you and your team. From Project Management to Continuous Deployment workflow through front-end tooling, backend and infrastructure.

services.title: Audit
services.description: Wondering if your website or application is following the standards, if a previous IT job was done correctly or simply to audit some aspects like design, code quality or security, we have a checklist that helps us provide our customers with a complete report from the audit.

services.title: IT Support
services.description: If you encounter some problems with your computers, security problems or general IT-related questions, we offer our expertize for your IT infrastructure.

head.title: About | laruche
head.description: At laruche we are humans, with a BIG motivation.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: At laruche we are humans, with a BIG motivation.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text:
Our mission is to simplify our clients and collaborators’ processes, imaging unique solutions.

We try to work alongside the clients toward the goal, in order to not only finish the project but also involve the client during the build phase.

We value open source works. We are enthusiastic about integrating them to our projects or creating some that might help someone or could receive the help of the community.

julien.name: Julien Grünhagel
julien.description: The founder of laruche who focuses on project management and consulting to ensure we deliver the best quality in our area.

maxime.name: Maxime Rossier
maxime.description: Software engineer who focuses on putting all your needs and desires at your fingertips.
